def_cn: 玷污，毁坏，损害，败坏(地位、名誉)
def_en: If a person or thing is tainted by something bad or undesirable, their status or reputation is harmed because they are associated with it.

def_cn: (地位、名誉的)玷污，污点，瑕疵
def_en: A taint is an undesirable quality which spoils the status or reputation of someone or something.
If an unpleasant substance taints food or medicine, the food or medicine is spoiled or damaged by it.
